tweets.text:
Delighted to have secured a debate in Parliament next week on the campaign to stop @bradfordmdc council's plans for an incinerator on the outskirts of #Keighley.

Despite top campaigning by the @AireIncinerator team, the @EnvAgency granted permission last year.üëé

Find out moreüëá https://t.co/H3ugIc8L37

@EnvAgencyMids Environment agency my arse! Pick on the elderly or vulnerable easy targets that won't put up a fight! How about taking on @RedIndustries2 who are gassing thousands of residents in Staffordshire even pushing 1 resident into attempting suicide through despair! Shame on you ü§¨ü§¨üë∫
@EnvAgencyMids So you're shutting Whalleys quarry for good then given the impact it has on thousands every day or are you scared! #stopthestink
@EnvAgencyMids You‚Äôre taking the piss now after what you are allowing to happen in Newcastle under Lyme . Will it take deaths for you to act ???
@EnvAgencyMids And so how much are you fining Walley‚Äôs Quarry Landfill for poisoning us every day and night of our lives eh? SORT IT OUT!
@48notwrong @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids maybe the people at @RedIndustries2 had a special kind of vaccine that makes them immune to the law

@JulieLintern @_RobbieMoore @bradfordmdc @AireIncinerator @EnvAgency I have yet to see a Tory leaflet that's not about Labour. Some wards have had Tory Councillors forever, you would think that one of them would have something positive to say about what they have done for the people they represent.

@DobbyWoods @EnvAgency @EnvAgencySE We‚Äôve been out there pulling rubbish from the river as well today and I can assure you there are a lot of sanitary products out of the tree‚Äôs and out of the mud. https://t.co/CTSGw3Ii0p

It‚Äôs illegal to coarse fish on rivers during close season from 15 March and 15 June. This is to protect spawning #fish. 

Our officers are patrolling across Hertfordshire and North London. 

You can report illegal activity on 0800 80 70 60. https://t.co/YF7uLgTgPE

This week we‚Äôre clearing flood debris and damaged trees from the island in the River #Don at #Neepsend, #Sheffield to help reduce #flood risk. We‚Äôre removing debris caught on the island because it could restrict the flow of the Don.  #floodaware @SheffCouncil https://t.co/pLjG7Am0wm

@EnvAgencyMids Unbelievable!! You will fine a pensioner for waste but allow us to live in the fumes coming from a poorly managed landfill. You are pathetic. @DefraGovUK Are you going to do anything to help us or what? #stopthestink #capitoff

urls.title: Corby man jailed and facing costs of ¬£750,000 for waste crime
urls.description: A Northamptonshire man, who was jailed in January, after a decade of waste offences was ordered this week to pay ¬£12,500 in costs and ¬£140 in victim surcharge.

tweets.text:
A 68-year-old man faces jail time and is ordered to clean up stock-piled waste which could cost him ¬£750,000.

If you suspect any illegal waste activity, please call: 0800 80 70 60

Read more about how we combat #illegal waste here: https://t.co/cksMMi14Qt https://t.co/3Bc9L1ic09

@_RobbieMoore @bradfordmdc @AireIncinerator @EnvAgency Divisive as per usual. Worth adding @cllr_vanda_g & @JulieLintern - the council doesn‚Äôt own the land or have any stake in the incinerator, ward cllrs oppose it, & the quasi-judicial panel that passed the plans was x-party. To call it ‚Äúthe council‚Äôs plan‚Äù is disingenuous at best.
@EnvAgencyMids I am currently 6 miles away from Walleys Quarry in Silverdale. I can smell the stench from here. You are allowing the site to poison the community #cruel #inhumane #StopTheStink
@EnvAgencyMids If proportional, Red Industries would get life in prison and a fine similar to the UK's GDP #StopTheStink

@EnvAgencyMids Could you please check Walley‚Äôs Quarry run by @RedIndustries2 The whole community is worried about what has been put in there.  If you want to do the right thing, please check, health is at risk. @stopthestink #stopthestink @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @DefraGovUK

@EnvAgencyMids I believe there is mismanagement of Walleys Landfill. 1000‚Äôs of complaints each month tell me I‚Äôm right. What‚Äôs the penalty for a minor & a significant breach of @RedIndustries2 permit? Is it a Prosecution? A fine?A closure?What‚Äôs the cost to health? ü§î@StinkStopthe #stopthestink
@MissMaisyDaisy @amy_shann @StinkStopthe @EnvAgencyMids @DefraGovUK Yeah they got a bloody nerve!

@EnvAgencyMids Are you having a laugh? You have the Audacity to tweet this when you know theirs been permit breaches at walleys quarry! We have to put up with day in day out! @StinkStopthe I think ours is a tad worseüëáüèª https://t.co/0HblrmIwjz

@EnvAgencyMids Shame that the Environmental Agency isn‚Äôt taking RED industries to account over Walley‚Äôs Landfill site at Silverdale, in Newcastle-under-Lyme, Staffordshire that is making thousands of lives a misery due to the daily stench that invades peoples homes and gardens.

@ClareDinnisEA I am not against legal and safe landfill sites, you would not know we were here. Wherever you live get to smell it for yourself, there is a chance you could throw up ! Stop ruining the lives of 30,000 people. When Covid is over and petitions can be signed in person it WILL CLOSE.
